original: @312b * // dbang phyug byed pa po nyid sel ba dang khyab 'jug byed pa po gcig nyid sel bar byed pa bzhugs /
analyzed: @312b * // dbang phyug byed pa po nyid sel ba dang khyab 'jug byed pa po gcig nyid sel bar byed pa bzhugs /
translated: The refutation of Īśvara as the creator and the refutation of Viṣṇu as the sole creator.

original: # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'i shva ra /
analyzed: a'i shva ra /
translated: Aiśvara

original: ka rhri tva ni r'a /
analyzed: ka rhri tva ni r'a /
translated: Karharitvaniḥ

original: kri ti b+dishno re ka kartr'i tva ni r'a ka ra nram n'a ma //
analyzed: kri ti b+dishno re ka kartr'i tva ni r'a ka ra nram n'a ma //
translated: Kṛtibhiṣṇorekaratītvaniḥkarāṇām

original: gu ro: pa d'a m'a dza na tv'a badzra sa tvam tsa btakti ta:/
analyzed: gu ro: pa d'a m'a dza na tv'a badzra sa tvam tsa btakti ta:/
translated: Guror padāmajñatvāvajrasatvaṃ cavatkṛtāḥ

original: su shi shya pra ti bodh'a rtham kri pa y'a li khya te ma y'a /
analyzed: su shi shya pra ti bodh'a rtham kri pa y'a li khya te ma y'a /
translated: Suśiṣyapratibodhārtmakṛpayālikhyate mayā

original: * // bod skad du /
analyzed: * // bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The refutation of Īśvara as the creator and the refutation of Viṣṇu as the sole creator

original: dbang phyug byed pa po nyid sel ba dang khyab 'jug byed pa po gcig nyid sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes dang // sdom sems la'ang gus btud nas //
analyzed: dbang phyug byed pa po nyid sel ba dang khyab 'jug byed pa po gcig nyid sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo // bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes dang // sdom sems la'ang gus btud nas //
translated: Homage to the Buddha.🔽Having bowed with respect to the lotus feet of the guru

original: slob ma bzang pos rtogs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: slob ma bzang pos rtogs bya'i phyir //
translated: And to the vow mind,

original: bdag gis brtse bas bri bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis brtse bas bri bar bya /
translated: I shall write this out of affection🔽For the sake of understanding by good students.

original: aa sti pu na r'i shva ra: karty'a sa ae ba bi ts'a tya t'am /
analyzed: aa sti pu na r'i shva ra: karty'a sa ae ba bi ts'a tya t'am /
translated: There are scholars who, like the sun,

original: ya: ka ro ti sa karnna //🔽ya: kri y'am ka ro ti sa karnna /🔽sam dznyo bha ba ti /🔽aa tra tsa ba yam bru ma: //🔽ki ma soo siddhim ka ro ti aa tha aa siddham bha /🔽aa tra siddham t'a ba ta na gu ru te /🔽yang dbang phyug byed pa po nyid du yod ces pa 'di la rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: ya: ka ro ti sa karnna // ya: kri y'am ka ro ti sa karnna / sam dznyo bha ba ti / aa tra tsa ba yam bru ma: // ki ma soo siddhim ka ro ti aa tha aa siddham bha / aa tra siddham t'a ba ta na gu ru te / yang dbang phyug byed pa po nyid du yod ces pa 'di la rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
translated: Yat karoti sa karman,🔽yat kriyām karoti sa karman.🔽Samjñā bhavati,🔽atra ca vayam brumah.🔽Kim sau siddhim karoti athāsiddham,🔽atra siddham tāvad guru te.🔽Now, this statement the Lord is the agent should be examined.🔽🔽

original: gang byed pa de byed pa po dang / gang bya ba byed pa de byed pa po'i ming du 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang byed pa de byed pa po dang / gang bya ba byed pa de byed pa po'i ming du 'gyur na /
translated: Yat karoti sa karoty atha karoty asau karotīti saṃjñobhavatīti /

original: 'di la yang khyed rnams la smras pa /🔽ci 'di grub pa zhig byed dam 'on te ma grub pa zhig byed //
analyzed: 'di la yang khyed rnams la smras pa / ci 'di grub pa zhig byed dam 'on te ma grub pa zhig byed //
translated: Atra ca vayam brumaḥ /🔽Kim asau siddhaṃ karoti athāsiddham /

original: de la grub pa ni re shig mi byed de /
analyzed: de la grub pa ni re shig mi byed de /
translated: Atha siddham, na tāvad asau karoti /

original: s'a dha m'a bh'a p'a ha /🔽ya th'a siddhe purga le pu na: k'a ra na tvam kirtvam tvam na sti pr'a ge pa siddha tv'a ta /
analyzed: s'a dha m'a bh'a p'a ha / ya th'a siddhe purga le pu na: k'a ra na tvam kirtvam tvam na sti pr'a ge pa siddha tv'a ta /
translated: Sādhyābhāvaḥ /🔽Yathāsiddhaṃ pūrvaṃ punar na kartavyaṃ tvam /

original: aa th'a si ddh'im ka ro ti tse ta /
analyzed: aa th'a si ddh'im ka ro ti tse ta /
translated: Tvaṃ na sthirapragāmitā siddhatvāt /🔽Atha siddhim karoti cet /

original: b'a lu k'a tee la ma siddham /
analyzed: b'a lu k'a tee la ma siddham /
translated: Vālukāṭeṣv asiddham /

original: k'urmma lo m'a di ka ma siddham /
analyzed: k'urmma lo m'a di ka ma siddham /
translated: The leaves of the kuruvinda tree are not produced by the potter,

original: ae ta de ba ka ro tu /🔽pu na ra tra karttri tvam na shakno ti /
analyzed: ae ta de ba ka ro tu / pu na ra tra karttri tvam na shakno ti /
translated: because he is not the producer of them.🔽And you cannot say that he is able to produce them,

original: sgrub byed med ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed med ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no object to be produced.

original: dper na gang zag 'grub pa la yang rgyu'i byed pa nyid byed pa por med de //
analyzed: dper na gang zag 'grub pa la yang rgyu'i byed pa nyid byed pa por med de //
translated: For example, in the production of a pot, the potter is not the agent because of the activity of the cause.

original: sngon nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause is already established.

original: ci ste ma grub pa byed na /
analyzed: ci ste ma grub pa byed na /
translated: But if you say that he produces what is not established,

original: bye ma la til mar ma grub pa dang / rus sbal gyi spu la sogs pa ma grub pas /
analyzed: bye ma la til mar ma grub pa dang / rus sbal gyi spu la sogs pa ma grub pas /
translated: then sesame oil would be produced from sand, and a cloth of tortoise hair, etc.

original: de nyid byed na /
analyzed: de nyid byed na /
translated: But if you say that he produces that which is not established,

original: yang 'dir byed pa po nyid kyis mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: yang 'dir byed pa po nyid kyis mi 'grub ste /
translated: then the potter would not be established as the agent.

original: @313a * // ku ta: aa siddham tva bh'a b'a ta /
analyzed: @313a * // ku ta: aa siddham tva bh'a b'a ta /
translated: The potter does not produce the unestablished pot,🔽because he is not the producer of it.

original: ae ba ma soo aa tha siddh'a siddham ka ro ti ta da pi na gha ta te /
analyzed: ae ba ma soo aa tha siddh'a siddham ka ro ti ta da pi na gha ta te /
translated: But you cannot say that he produces the established pot,

original: pha ra spa ra bi rotdha ta /
analyzed: pha ra spa ra bi rotdha ta /
translated: because the established is not to be produced.🔽And the established is not to be produced by the established,

original: ya: siddha: sa siddha ae ba yorda siddha:sa ae b'a siddha:/
analyzed: ya: siddha: sa siddha ae ba yorda siddha:sa ae b'a siddha:/
translated: nor is the non-established to be produced by the non-established.

original: ae bam ta da na yo: pa ra sbu ra bi ro dha: sy'a de bam /🔽ya th'a tsa a'a lo k'andha /
analyzed: ae bam ta da na yo: pa ra sbu ra bi ro dha: sy'a de bam / ya th'a tsa a'a lo k'andha /
translated: And the established is not to be produced by the non-established,🔽nor is the non-established to be produced by the established.🔽And the established is not to be produced by the established,🔽nor is the non-established to be produced by the non-established.

original: ci las she na /
analyzed: ci las she na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the thing is not established.

original: de bzhin du 'di'o ci ste grub pa dang / ma grub pa byed na de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'o ci ste grub pa dang / ma grub pa byed na de yang mi 'thad de /
translated: Similarly, if it is established and not established, that is also not tenable.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mutually contradictory.

original: gang grub pa de grub pa nyid dang / gang ma grub de nyid ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: gang grub pa de grub pa nyid dang / gang ma grub de nyid ma grub pa ste /
translated: That which is established is just established, and that which is not established is just not established.

original: de ltar na 'di dag phan tshun 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di dag phan tshun 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because these are mutually contradictory.🔽For example, like light and darkness, and like the Karavīra flower and the moon.🔽Then, if light is darkness,🔽then darkness is light.

original: dper na snang ba dang mun pa dag dang kr'a ra yordz'i ba na ma ra na yo ri ba /
analyzed: dper na snang ba dang mun pa dag dang kr'a ra yordz'i ba na ma ra na yo ri ba /
translated: If the living are the dead,

original: aa tha ya tr'a lo ko birya te /🔽ta tr'andha k'a ro n'a sti /
analyzed: aa tha ya tr'a lo ko birya te / ta tr'andha k'a ro n'a sti /
translated: then the dead are living.🔽If the dead are not the living,🔽then the living are not the dead.

original: ya tr'andha k'a rasta tr'a lo ko n'a sti ae ba /
analyzed: ya tr'andha k'a rasta tr'a lo ko n'a sti ae ba /
translated: If the living are not the dead,🔽then the dead are not the living.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.

original: yo hi dz'i ba ti sa dz'i ba tye ba /
analyzed: yo hi dz'i ba ti sa dz'i ba tye ba /
translated: If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the dead,🔽then the dead are the living.

original: yo mri to mri ta ae ba sa: aat ae ba siddha siddha yo ree ka t'a bh'a b'a ta /🔽a'i shva ra sya ka rtri tvam n'a ddya /
analyzed: yo mri to mri ta ae ba sa: aat ae ba siddha siddha yo ree ka t'a bh'a b'a ta / a'i shva ra sya ka rtri tvam n'a ddya /
translated: If the living are not the dead,🔽then the dead are not the living.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.🔽If the living are not the living,🔽then the dead are not the dead.🔽If the living are the living,🔽then the dead are the dead.

original: gang gson pa dang shi ba dag bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gson pa dang shi ba dag bzhin no //
translated: If the living are not the living,

original: yang gang na snang ba yod pa de na mun pa med do //
analyzed: yang gang na snang ba yod pa de na mun pa med do //
translated: Where there is light, there is no darkness.

original: gang na mun pa yod pa de na snang ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang na mun pa yod pa de na snang ba med pa nyid do //
translated: Where there is darkness, there is no light.

original: gang gson pa de ni gson pa nyid dang / gang shi ba de ni shi ba kho na ste /
analyzed: gang gson pa de ni gson pa nyid dang / gang shi ba de ni shi ba kho na ste /
translated: One who is alive is just alive, and one who is dead is just dead.

original: de nyid kyi phyir grub ba dang ma grub bdag gcig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir grub ba dang ma grub bdag gcig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since that which is accomplished and that which is not accomplished are not the same,

original: dbang phyug byed pa po nyid du yod pa min pa pe ti ma tam /🔽kinytsa aa pa ra ma pi d'u sha nam sy'a ta /
analyzed: dbang phyug byed pa po nyid du yod pa min pa pe ti ma tam / kinytsa aa pa ra ma pi d'u sha nam sy'a ta /
translated: Īśvara does not exist as an agent.🔽kīdṛśaḥ kiñcit aparamapi duḥśanamasyātaḥ |

original: kim sva ya mutpa rya pa r'anka ro ti /
analyzed: kim sva ya mutpa rya pa r'anka ro ti /
translated: kiṃ svayaṃ muktāparāṇ karoti |

original: aa nu tpanno b'a /🔽aa nutpa dya ca sa yam /
analyzed: aa nu tpanno b'a / aa nutpa dya ca sa yam /
translated: anutpannasya vā |🔽anutpādye ca saṃsāraṃ tāvat parāṇ karoti na śaknoti |

original: t'a bta pa r'a na karttum na shakno ti /🔽ku ta: sva ya me b'a nutpann'a r'u pa t'a ta /
analyzed: t'a bta pa r'a na karttum na shakno ti / ku ta: sva ya me b'a nutpann'a r'u pa t'a ta /
translated: kutaste svayaṃ muktānutpannā rūpatā |

original: ya th'a nya nu tpanna sya bandh'a ta na ya sya /
analyzed: ya th'a nya nu tpanna sya bandh'a ta na ya sya /
translated: yathainaṃ nutpannasya bandhastathainaṃ muktasyāpi |

original: 'di nyid do zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: 'di nyid do zhes 'dod do //
translated: This is the assertion.

original: sun 'byin gzhan yang 'gyur te /🔽ci rang nyid skyes pas gzhan byed dam /
analyzed: sun 'byin gzhan yang 'gyur te / ci rang nyid skyes pas gzhan byed dam /
translated: Another refutation is as follows:🔽Does he cause others to be liberated by himself being liberated,

original: 'on te ma skyas pas byed //
analyzed: 'on te ma skyas pas byed //
translated: or does he cause others to be liberated by himself not being liberated?

original: rang nyid ma skyes pas ni re shig gzhan byed par mi nus te /
analyzed: rang nyid ma skyes pas ni re shig gzhan byed par mi nus te /
translated: Since it is not arisen, it cannot make another.

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: Why?

original: rang nyid ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the nature of not being arisen.

original: dang po gsham gyi bu ni ma skyes pas /🔽@313b kurd'a la p'a ta n'a di kri y'a na pra bartta te /🔽ta th'a a'i shva ra sy'a pi /🔽aa tha tsa sva ya mutpa dya pa r'ank'a ro ti /🔽ta d'a ka sm'a du tpan:/🔽kim sva ta: kim par ta:/🔽au bha ya to b'a /🔽aa tra sva tast'a bannotpanna: sv'atma ni kri y'a bi ro dh'a ta /
analyzed: dang po gsham gyi bu ni ma skyes pas / @313b kurd'a la p'a ta n'a di kri y'a na pra bartta te / ta th'a a'i shva ra sy'a pi / aa tha tsa sva ya mutpa dya pa r'ank'a ro ti / ta d'a ka sm'a du tpan:/ kim sva ta: kim par ta:/ au bha ya to b'a / aa tra sva tast'a bannotpanna: sv'atma ni kri y'a bi ro dh'a ta /
translated: First, a son who is not arisen

original: na hi kha ra ta ra ka ra sa rko ba la sogs pa'i bya ba la mi 'jug pa bzhin no //
analyzed: na hi kha ra ta ra ka ra sa rko ba la sogs pa'i bya ba la mi 'jug pa bzhin no //
translated: does not engage in activities such as🔽going, standing, sitting, and lying down.

original: de bzhin du dbang phyug kyang ngo //🔽ci ste rang nyid skyes pas gzhan byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang phyug kyang ngo // ci ste rang nyid skyes pas gzhan byed na /
translated: Likewise, the creator also.🔽Then, if he is arisen by himself,

original: de'i tshe rang ngam gzhan nam /
analyzed: de'i tshe rang ngam gzhan nam /
translated: what is he? What is another?

original: gnyis ka las sam /
analyzed: gnyis ka las sam /
translated: What is both?

original: ci zhig las skyes /
analyzed: ci zhig las skyes /
translated: What is arisen from no cause?

original: 'dir rang las skyes pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rang las skyes pas ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, he is not arisen from himself, because his activity would be obstructed.🔽Nor is he arisen from another, because that would be unreasonable.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is contradictory for an action to be done upon itself.

original: ches rno ba'i ral gri'i b'a la dhva r'a s'a m'adm'a ni dztsha ttum sa martho bha ba ti /🔽na hi su shi kshi to bi na ta dha tu: sva k'i yam skand'a m'a tu hya nartti tum shakno ti /🔽kinytsa sva ya me ba dza n+ya: sva ya me ba dza na ka yi ti /🔽ai tye bam trishta mishta b'a /🔽sva ya me ba bi t'a sva ya me ba sos kyang rang gi bdag nyid la gcod par nus pa med do //
analyzed: ches rno ba'i ral gri'i b'a la dhva r'a s'a m'adm'a ni dztsha ttum sa martho bha ba ti / na hi su shi kshi to bi na ta dha tu: sva k'i yam skand'a m'a tu hya nartti tum shakno ti / kinytsa sva ya me ba dza n+ya: sva ya me ba dza na ka yi ti / ai tye bam trishta mishta b'a / sva ya me ba bi t'a sva ya me ba sos kyang rang gi bdag nyid la gcod par nus pa med do //
translated: The edge of a very sharp sword cannot cut itself.

original: legs par bslabs pa'i gar mkhan mkhas pas kyang rang gi phrag pa la zhon nas gar byed nus pa med do //
analyzed: legs par bslabs pa'i gar mkhan mkhas pas kyang rang gi phrag pa la zhon nas gar byed nus pa med do //
translated: A skilled dancer cannot mount on his own shoulders and dance there.

original: yang ci rang nyid kho na bskyed bya dang rang nyid kho na skyed byed do zhes /
analyzed: yang ci rang nyid kho na bskyed bya dang rang nyid kho na skyed byed do zhes /
translated: How can that which produces itself be produced by itself?

original: 'di ltar blta zhing 'dod na /
analyzed: 'di ltar blta zhing 'dod na /
translated: Thus, the one who is desirous of the produced and the producer

original: rang nyid pha dang rang nyid bu'o zhes zer ba pu tra ai ti /
analyzed: rang nyid pha dang rang nyid bu'o zhes zer ba pu tra ai ti /
translated: cannot say that which is produced is itself and that which produces is itself.🔽The one who is desirous of the produced and the producer🔽cannot say that which is produced is itself and that which produces is itself.

original: ni sha b'a do lo ka pra siddha: aa tha bha ba tu ba ra ae ba ma pi na gha ta te /
analyzed: ni sha b'a do lo ka pra siddha: aa tha bha ba tu ba ra ae ba ma pi na gha ta te /
translated: The world is not produced by God, as it is not produced by a potter, etc.🔽 But it is produced by the Lord, who is different from the world, and who is eternal.

original: y'a ba t'a a'i sh'a ra sya bya ti re ke na pa ra sy'a bh'a b'a ta /🔽aa tha p'a ram par++y++y'a rbha ba tu /🔽ae bam tsa pa ra to nya pya na basth'a pra sangga sy'a ta /
analyzed: y'a ba t'a a'i sh'a ra sya bya ti re ke na pa ra sy'a bh'a b'a ta / aa tha p'a ram par++y++y'a rbha ba tu / ae bam tsa pa ra to nya pya na basth'a pra sangga sy'a ta /
translated: But the Lord is not eternal,

original: aa n'a di r'u pa tv'a ta dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: aa n'a di r'u pa tv'a ta dang 'dra ste /
translated: because he is not perceived, like other things.🔽 But he is not like other things,🔽 because he is not perceived by anyone.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten na grags pa yang med do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten na grags pa yang med do //
translated: But he is not different from the world,

original: ci ste gzhan pa nyid kyis kyang byed pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan pa nyid kyis kyang byed pa mi 'thad de /
translated: because he is not perceived as different.🔽 But he is not perceived, because he is formless, like the son of an infertile woman.🔽 But he is not formless,🔽 because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is formless,🔽 because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.🔽 But he is not like a pot, etc.,

original: ji srid dbang phyug gi tha dad pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji srid dbang phyug gi tha dad pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.🔽 But he is not like a pot, etc.,

original: ci ste brgyud pas 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste brgyud pas 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.

original: de lta gzhan las kyang thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta gzhan las kyang thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: But he is not like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,

original: thog ma med pa'i phyir ro /🔽@314a * // sa to ya syu de ra bh'a basta sy'a ba s'a na sya d'u sha na ma bh'a ba ae ba /
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i phyir ro /🔽@314a * // sa to ya syu de ra bh'a basta sy'a ba s'a na sya d'u sha na ma bh'a ba ae ba /
translated: because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.🔽 But he is not like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.🔽 But he is not like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.🔽 But he is not like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is not perceived, like a pot, etc.🔽 But he is not like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is the Lord.🔽 But he is like a pot, etc.,🔽 because he is

original: b'i dza sy'a bh'a be aadgur da nda sh'a kh'a la tra pushpa pha l'a d'i n'a ma bh'a bo bha ba ti /
analyzed: b'i dza sy'a bh'a be aadgur da nda sh'a kh'a la tra pushpa pha l'a d'i n'a ma bh'a bo bha ba ti /
translated: are not tenable🔽if the appropriator does not exist.

original: ku to b'i dza sy'a bh'a b'a ta /
